resources.string: Welcome to the Shoe Store. We are your number one source for shoes, boots, cleats, loafers, pumps, slippers, sneakers, clogs, moccasins, sandals, high heels, penny loafers, wing-tips and all other kinds of foot gear. No socks.\n\nIn the next screen, you will learn how to add a new shoe to our inventory. Click the button below to get started.

Clicking on the button below will take you to a list of shoes in our inventory. Initially, it will be empty. You can add a shoe to the list by clicking on the action button with a plus sign in the listing screen. This will take you to a form where you can enter the name of the shoe, the company that manufactures it, the size, and a description.\n\n Uploading images is not supported at this time.
